[Category] Brief commit message

Summary:
- Explain what was changed or added in 1-2 sentences.

Changes:
- List the specific files or features that were modified.
- Use bullet points for clarity.

Why:
- Describe the reason for the change. (If made any changes)
- Explain how this commit improves the project. (If needed)

Related Issues:
- Reference the GitHub issue number (if applicable) using `#issue-number`. (Example: "Issue #4"
